name: First Person Adventure Game
description:
Team: Bhuvan, Kevin, Yeonseo

This room escape has three theme rooms. Try your best to escape the rooms and avoid traps. Find different treasures in the rooms for scores and get keys to escape. We used sound to let the users know when they get a key.

First room: Find two keys to open a room, and get the master key to move to the other room.

Second room: Find the key and move to the next room. Be careful with the doors.

Last room: Find the keys and escape the room. Try to avoid traps. Control is important.
